channel.title: Data Science Interviews on Ángela Castillo-Gill
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Interviews on Ángela Castillo-Gill

item.title: Data science interviews: Lessons learned
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Why? 3 Here’s how I spent my time 3.1 Adapting CVs 3.2 Face-to-face interviews 3.3 Filling out forms 3.4 Interview prep 3.5 Job admin 3.6 Phone calls 3.7 Writing cover letters 4 What would I have done differently? 4.1 Establish healthy boundaries with recruiters 4.2 Focus on the basics for technical test prep 4.3 Schedule interviews at favourable times 4.4 Rehearse not knowing, or being wrong, and feeling embarrassed/nervous/uncomfortable and STILL speaking with confidence 5 What would I do again?
